dynamicpagelistengine-desc: Provide dynamic page lists with configurable and extensible features to [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Scribunto modules] and to other extensions
dple-error-invalid-ns-index: DynamicPageListEngine error: No namespace with index $1.
dple-error-no-criteria: DynamicPageListEngine error: No selection criteria specified.
dple-error-too-expensive: DynamicPageListEngine error: Attempt to perform a query as expensive as $1 joined database tables, while at most $2 are allowed.
dple-error-too-many-expensive-functions: DynamicPageListEngine error: Too many expensive functions used on this page.
